title: Music Thwarted by the Holocaust Will Now Be Published
description: G. Schirmer will publish more than 400 pieces by Jewish composers, allowing them to be heard on a wider scale.
dc:creator: Javier C. Hernández
category: University of Music and Performing Arts (Vienna, Austria)
media:description: Walter Arlen, whose family fled persecution in 1939, is among the composers to be published.
